entry.title: Friday: Flurries at times heavy. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon.
entry.summary: Flurries at times heavy. Blowing snow. Amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. Temperature falling to minus 21 this afternoon. Wind chill minus 36 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Friday 03 February 2023
